price: Ahubwo ni We wenyine mwakwiyambaza, maze yabishaka akabakiza ibyo mumwiyambajemo, nuko mugahita mwibagirwa ibyo mumubangikanya na byo (kuko nta cyo bishoboye).
arabic: بَلۡ إِيَّاهُ تَدۡعُونَ فَيَكۡشِفُ مَا تَدۡعُونَ إِلَيۡهِ إِن شَآءَ وَتَنسَوۡنَ مَا تُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: bal iyyāhu tadʿūna fayakshifu mā tadʿūna ilayhi in shāa watansawna mā tush'rikūna
